text: "You're Beautiful" is a 2005 single by James Blunt. You're Beautiful or You Are Beautiful may also refer to: * You're Beautiful (TV series), a South Korean television drama * "You're Beautiful" (Nathaniel Willemse song) * "You're Beautiful", a song by Roger Whittaker from The Last Farewell * "You Are Beautiful", a phrase spelt out on 108 North State Street * "You Are Beautiful", a Rodgers and Hammerstein song from the 1958 musical Flower Drum Song
title: You're Beautiful (disambiguation)
